summary: The core/map package implements an interactive map control for the Flet UI framework, providing a base layer abstraction and concrete layer types such as circles, markers, polygons, polylines, and raster tiles. It also includes configuration models, event handling, and attribution overlays (rich and simple) to customize map appearance, behavior, and user interaction.
business_intent: Allow developers to easily integrate fully featured, customizable maps into Flet applications, supporting dynamic geographic visualizations, user interaction, and branding through layered markers and attributions.
